comment.body: @Rebelb0y11:  Which part of your hight expectations was not met?
You can also tick the box "Follow comments on your posts" at the top, just right of your name.
Your parents must be funny people
Hi from Switzerland. I just spent a day with porte√±os that I have known for almost a decade :-)
@Pablo Arroyo: Cool, turns out that I spent a night in Catamarca a long time ago.  [viaje con casa rodante. media 2007 en america do sur](/1MrcCZjfRCKeJZAENsjDqf7dvDhEhFpsXY/#apr20)
Switzerland is nice. But so are a lot of places.

Zeronet is specialized for websites, while IPFS is for files of any type and any size. So, ZeroNet has additional logic like for blogging or ZeroMe. IPFS has additional logic for splitting up large files into junks, and streaming them to requesting users.
@Pablo Arroyo: The zite is bigger than usual. You have to click yes when it asks you to increase the limit.
How will the block reward be determined afterwards? Will there be premined zcash in existence in the first month?
I don't think there is an automatic procedure. Just copy the posts from wordpress to your zero blog, and convert the formatting of links and pictures.
Probably best to run zeronet on your personal server, and connect with your mobile browser through an encrypted channel.
@RiotPulv: Impressive list. But I didn't find any of the top listed ones in the debian repository. Any experience with one of them?
